gameDetails.name: Mage Wars Academy: Warlock Expansion
gameDetails.description:
Mage Wars: Academy – Warlock Expansion is an expansion for Mage Wars.

A new student has enrolled at the Academy! The nefarious Warlock seeks to prove the way of darkness is unequaled as he summons shadowy denizens and casts secret enchantments to curse his enemies! Compatible with both Mage Wars Academy and Arena, this character expansion comes with 72 Spell Cards, game markers, and complete rules.
